text: Ej Rasul, ojo az holi kase, ki Alloh ʙa u podsohi ʙaxsida ʙud va ʙo Iʙrohim dar mavridi tavhid va ruʙuʙijati Parvardigoras mucodala kard, xaʙar dori? Cun az Iʙrohim suol kard, Parvardigori tu kist? On goh, ki Iʙrohim guft: Parvardigori man zote ast, ki tanho U meofarad va tadʙir menamojad va zinda gardonidan va mironidan tanho az oni Ust. Guft: "Man niz zinda megardonam va memironam Iʙrohim guft: "Alloh xursedro az masriq ʙar meovarad va ojo metavoni tu onro az maƣriʙ ʙarovari". Pas kase, ki kufr varzida ʙud hajron sud va huccatas ʙarʙod raft. Alloh qavmi sitamkorro ʙa rohi haq hidojat namekunad
